column5: This would be hilarious to drive around!
That'll be Terry and Brian in less years than you think!!!
That'll be Terry and Brian in less years than you think!!!  LMAO That thing ZINGS compared to this, but we are pioneers.

I would race u guys for pinks anytime, even on all season radials LOL I would love to give it on one of those ,,, Brian if u were sitting beside me and I was driving u would have to grab the oh s...t bar if u  are familiar with the passenger side of an 05 sierra 4x4 lol We did this maneuver drifting on asphalt to go to Herberts western wear years ago to get tickets to see toby keith when he played at burl creek. my son at 15 thought he could muscle a vehicle until he rode with me ,,,his indentations are still on the bar and yes we did beat others there to get the tickets If we ever have the resources I would love either of those  Dear Santa  lol  JUMP SIMCOES PRESSURE CRACKS NO PROBLEM  :tease:
